name: Game for MDC Game Jam 2019
description:
Game made for MDC Game Jam 2019

Will be updated daily till "MDC Game Jam 2019" goes to the voting period. I invite you to play and vote in seven days.

Instruction:

left arrow key - MOVE LEFT right arrow key - MOVE RIGHT up arrow key - JUMP up up arrow key - DOUBLE JUMP esc key - RESTART QUEST/LEVEL

Game goals:

get points advance a level +1 Get package +3 Double package +6 Package in rest place (one time per level)
